Replies.Reply: What the fuck?     You're doing it wrong.
What did you just say, old man?
I know you didn't just disrespect me, did you? You that fucking stupid? You disrespect me, and I'll tattoo this ceiling with your fucking brains!
You're lucky. I can't kill you 'til you finish this thing. Gimme that mirror! How's it looking?
Not bad. Not bad. For an old fuck.
Wanna let us in on the joke?
What came out of the shadows?
A ninja? Are you kidding me?
You old fuck! You had me going!
The needle is doing what the needle does.
That night, one of their blades struck here. I should have died, but for an accident of birth. My heart is here, on the other side.
But you are real, aren't you?
But you are real, aren't you?

The irezumi does not hide the skin, the tattoo reveals the nature of the man and illuminates the four noble professions in the Book of Five Rings: the Warrior, the Artist, the Merchant, and the farmer. If there is a conflict between the needle and the skin, between the mark and the man, then perhaps the path you have chosen is not the path for which you are suited.
Years ago, I watched a man open an envelope like that one.
There were many with him and they laughed like you laugh now. Then it came from the shadows and their laughter was drowned in blood.
Hey, boss. This just came for you.
Are you a student? Tourist?   Here on business?
When was the last time someone cooked you a real meal?
You could come by, let me make you a proper dinner!
Ms. Ali, my privacy is very important to me. If you enter my apartment again without my permission, I will leave your building.
You came alone. The Ozunu clan would never make such a mistake.
You shouldn't do that. It's against the rules. If they catch you --
They'll put you in the box.
She nods, Raizo's eyes lite up.
She runs with the flashlight to a bureau. Inside is a black tablecloth. He pulls her shoes off.
Follow me.    Step where I step.
Does not matter. Just get as far away from here as fast as you can without drawing attention.
Ninja only kill two kinds of people. The first kind has power and money. The other kind is trying to stop them.
If you leave while I am gone they will catch you and kill you.
Get undressed. Shower. Do not use the hotel soap. Or any towel.
I'm trying to save your life.
Most locks are not worth the metal they're made of.
At ninja school I minored in electrical engineering.
You shouldn't do that they'll catch you.
They'll put you in the box.
I told you.   I tried to warn you.
But you did it anyway.   Why?
The only time you lied to me was when you told me your size.
It's too late. All that matters is the Rihla. Get the manuscript before they get here.
You've got to get out of here!
I don't want to sound critical--
No. Not a hospital.     Another place.
The Hanta Kirra will come for you.
You know the law. He will cut your heart from your chest.
Just because I was asleep doesn't mean I couldn't hear you.
The breath I take after you are dead, will be the first of my life.
This is the truth of your lives and it will remain true after death.
This is my new son. I have given him the name Raizo. Welcome him as your brother.
On the street. Abandoned by your parents. Without a home. Without people to care for you. You should have done as most children do, and gone quietly from this world, to the next.
But, instead you fought. As you did here today. You fought. And you won.
Scars are the calligraphy of violence, Raizo. They inscribe the story of one's life.
You survived because you are different. You are special. That is why you are here. That is why the Great Current, which flows beneath all life, carried you to me.
Several of the younger members of the clan are sitting at the table, about to eat.
The knife slices down along his palm, opening a split; the flesh parts, yet no blood flows.
Master them, and you master the self.
This is the power of the Ozunu clan.
This is the way of the ninja.
The world feeds on the weak.
Strength is the only virtue that nature respects.
Hone your body. Sharpen your mind.
He gouges three fingers into the boy's stomach and twists something inside of him.
These next five years will be the most important of your training.
A true Shinobi lives in darkness.
Raizo gets up, slowly releasing the tension in his jaw.
This is the law of the Nine Clans.
Your entire life has brought you to this moment. Do not fail yourself. Do not fail your family.
Keep it. It will remind you that every minute of your life is a gift that I have given you.
You have made me proud tonight, Raizo. There are some who believed you would fail, but I knew you would not.
You have a strength inside you Raizo. You must use that strength, now to show me that you are truly Ozunu.
A daughter that turned her back on her family. She tried to run.
It is the law of the Nine Clans.
All failure must be sown into the flesh.
You will wear this disgrace for the rest of your life!
A child of mine, my daughter, betrayed us. She refused these gifts. Rejected our clan.
Hers is a shame that can only be purged with blood.
You who returned her shall have this honor.
You are Ozunu. Your life is meaningless compared to the survival of the Clan. This is our deepest truth. Because of it, we have endured for hundreds of years, and will endure for hundreds more.
I have waited many years for this moment. I have dreamed it, many times.
You will suffer for seven days, one day for each year you defied me.
You will know pain like no other human being has ever known.
Your death will be remembered for a thousand years as a testament to the will and strength of the Ozunu Clan.
You have not forgotten your training. You will always be mine, child.
Perhaps this is the best way for you to die.
Oh, Mr. Nan, good, you're back.
We had a heating problem, and I had to go into your apartment.
Yes, fine, it's all fixed. You keep it very dark and spare in there.
It's a pattern, like the currents of the ocean.

Some people see money as the root of all evil, but to me it looks like a fingerprint. Whether we're talking about 19th century Korea, or 21st century Iraq, the game is the same. If you want to understand why certain things are happening, you have to understand the flow of money.

Ozunu. I think. I've been going through some of the original transcripts of the trial of Kunitomo Shigeaki. The prosecutor questioned him about a payment of 100 pounds of gold. Shigeaki answered that he didn't know what the prosecutor was talking about.
Exactly. I figure these clans are like a thousand years old. They probably don't change a lot.
I started looking at international wire transfers, targeting banks in the regions of several high-
was transferred from the bank of Shanghai. The exact market value of one hundred pounds of gold.
I thought you might say that so I checked how often this particular bank transferred that market equivalent to a hundred pounds of gold in the last three years.

They're real Ryan. You can call them spooks, or assassins, or whatever you want if it makes you feel better, but they're out there. They're killing people and nobody is doing a damn thing to stop them.
How long have you been here? And you can't say "zwei cola bitte"?
Do you ever stop being a cop?
I think so. Same template as before. The transfer was made the day before a multiple homicide in Osaka. The police and newspapers are calling it a gangland slaying.
But you said you found something.
Is he still alive?    We need to find him.
You believe it now, don't you?
Then why are you doing this?
What are you going to do?
Was he married? Did he have a family?
I know you Ryan, you would have checked.
I'm with Europol. We spoke on the phone.
I understand the report caused some problems for him inside the KGB.
Do you know what they talked about?
Can I ask how he died?
Most of this is from Sabatin.
That's how it started. I made a mistake, mixed up the case code and they sent me that.
Yeah. I know. I don't understand why they're fighting though. It could be a clan war.
I just thought if this was real, if these clans were killing people, you know, it was our job to try to stop them.
Isn't that what your dad would do?
Look, I know I broke the rules.
No why. Has Agent Maslow done something?
What are we going to do?
Ryan, I can't let you lose your job because of me-
I've never even fired one of these.
he stops her with a gesture.
Does that mean what I think it means?
I don't have a lot of options okay. I once took a Tae Bo class, but that's the extent of my Kung Fu abilities.
I'm going to have to make a phone call in order to get the manuscript.
I don't see anything back there.
How do you know so much about them?
You flunked out of ninja school or something?
Okay, if you're not going to say anything, do you mind if I talk?
My name is Mika by the way.
Yeah, well usually if someone introduces themselves it is a convention that the other person does likewise.
Interesting nature verses nurture case study I imagine.
If it's okay with you, I'll try to fill in some of the blanks. You must have been taken by the Ozunu clan, trained to be an assassin, but something happened and you decided to opt out of the program.
Yeah, I got some moves too. I'm pretty lethal with the research thing.
But here's a question I can't answer: since you didn't know I went to Sabatin's, why did you save me?
I understand retail therapy as well as any girl but I think it's a little late.
Don't you know how to knock?
Wow. They teach you that at ninja school?
You're going to steal a car?
In for a penny, in for a pounding.
I know.   I'm in a bit of trouble-
He's on our side, Ryan.   I trust him.
I promised him the Battuta pages.
Can you meet us? In three hours?
He's a good man. It's all right.
Ryan, you know this is wrong!   It can't be legal! What is this place? Your own private Guantanamo?
Ryan you're making a huge mistake!
So two weeks ago, there's no such thing as a ninja and now every city in the world has a warrant for one?
They want him dead. He's been fighting them for years.
Could you give us a moment?
If he wanted to hurt me he could have done that a while ago.
Listen, Maslow is on our side.
Ryan, can I talk to you?
I don't have time for this shit.
What were you doing in the street?!
You have to go to a hospital.
A day?!?     What should I do?
Moving.   He told me to keep moving.
I know you can't hear me, so I'm sure this doesn't matter, but I'm going to say it anyway.
I wanted to think you for saving my life.
And I hope you can forgive me for this.
They took him.     Ten minutes ago.
Where is he?   I can't see him!
You're excited, Mika. You know I get nervous when you're excited.
hundred's. According to you, she was off'd by one of these ninja clans.
So you start to wonder, in this ever changing world, if the cost of a man's life has remained constant.

Look, no one's denying the historical record, Mika. But the whole idea just doesn't fit in with a modern world. It's like one of those questions on an IQ test: which of these doesn't belong in this sentence: laptops, space shuttles, nanotechnology, ninjas.
Course I can, but you tend to hear more interesting things if people don't know you can understand what they're saying.
Not the way I was raised. My dad always said, being a cop has nothing to do with a clock. It's a consequence of consciousness often interpreted as desire.
How do you know what the police report says? You're not still requisitioning evidence with my clearance codes, are you?
Denied.    It was a long shot at best.
A report. A friend of mine in Moscow, tipped me to it.
It was written during the height of the Cold War by a high ranking KGB agent named Aleksei Sabatin.
Mind you, he doesn't call them ninjas.
Same thing that's going to happen to me, if I keep hanging around with you- booted out of the service for mental instability.
But I can guarantee you that it has nothing to do with the fact that you're the most attractive researcher that I've ever worked with.
Last night I'm working late and I get a visit. Guy named Zabranski.
I don't understand what is really going on, but I'm smart enough to recognize a warning when I see one.
Why? It's obvious. If your little fantasy has even slightest chance of being real, then these Nine Clans would have some pretty major juice protecting them.
We are going to tip-toe, very carefully from here on out. You understand? You don't do anything else without checking with me. Got it?
People die of heart attacks, Mika.
God, you are relentless, aren't you.
I told you to stop using my confirmation code.
When you were slapping my code all over town like some phone number in a bathroom, did you happen to notice the classification code on the cases you were digging through?
That's right. DNP. DO NOT FUCKING PURSUE!
Right now there are people from internal affairs, CIA, Homeland Security and for all I know the Martian Fucking Military in my office tearing the place apart.
I don't know what they're looking for but I think you do.
So you requisitioned this by accident. You used my code which is why you didn't want to show me this. Which is also why they're tearing apart my office right now.

Very noble of you but I've got the feeling this isn't a slap-on-the wrist kinda consequence. Let me take this and try to make some sense of this shitstorm you started. In the meantime, you will not say anything to anybody.
This is Ryan Maslow. Leave a number-
I couldn't talk earlier.   They're watching me.
I know how Sabatin must have felt.

Come on Mika, how could he take something that didn't exist? He couldn't. Which means that I couldn't copy it either, and if I couldn't copy it than I can't be violating international laws and agreements by still having it.
Your going to go home. Pack your bags and go on holiday.
Don't fucking argue with me, Mika.
I'm not talking about my job, Mika.
Take this. It's clean, no serial number. Untraceable.
I'm going to try to find some help. Until then, I need you gone.
I know. It's unbelievable. I've investigated, world bank officials, drug cartels, arms dealers, and I've never faced this kind of heat. For ninjas. Fucking unbelievable!
Mika! For Christ sake I've been calling for hours!
Trouble? You miss jury duty you're in trouble. You're in some kind of bottomless pit of deep shit.
Your guardian angel? Is it him?
Something's wrong with the infrared cam.
Then why isn't he showing up?
I don't think so. We got reports from Washington, London, Osaka all tagging your boy. Only problem we have is where to extradite him first.
We must respect the jurisprudence of the regional government and corresponding law enforcement agencies.
No? You ever heard of Stockholm Syndrome I'm getting the feeling I'm looking at a pretty serious case of it.
He's a killer, Mika. Weren't you the one telling me it was our job to stop him.
You're not saying anything worth hearing. Look, if want to do the insubordination tango, let's go, but not in front of the kids okay?
Listen to me, we don't have much time. Look, I don't know what you've stumbled into, but somebody is pulling some major strings inside.
I believe you. I've been in this business too long not to smell a set-up. But we have to be careful how we handle this. And I can't risk you going AWOL on me again, because --
-- because I don't want anything to happen to you.
If trouble comes, turn this on, no matter where, and I'll find you.
We have to do this again, Coretti?
I think these gentlemen can handle a few whack-jobs wearing pajamas.
I'm working on that. You have to give me a little time.
Go with her! Secure the prisoner!
I hope that wasn't my liver. Gonna need that soon.
Two minutes.    Keep it in gear.
Not yet.   We're heading upstairs now.
He took off.   We think they went after him.
Mika, the situation's a little different. Jurisprudence goes out the fucking window when my men get attacked.
Mika, it's gonna be all right.
We'll keep your promise. They're too many people involved now.
Just tell me where you are.
No more grenades, not until we get the children out!
Is she going to be okay?
He said you saved his life.
So you kept your promise. Can we go home now?
If it's not too much trouble, could you help me with this?

Young Raizo stands in the central chamber of the compound. The floor beneath his bare feet is made of thousands of carefully mitred pieces of gleaming wood laid down in an intricate pattern. They are not, however, glued down to the floor. The slightest wrong move will make them shift noisily.

Historical evidence suggests that Ibn-Battuta's journey through the far east brought him into contact with what might be one of the oldest of the Nine Clans. He travels with a group of orphans that are being taken from a city devastated by war to the Shido of the Ozunu clan. The people of the surrounding province refer to the Shido as "The Orphanage."
Battuta describes a ceremonial dinner followed by a display of martial skill. The combatants were children neither beyond the age of ten.
His host explains that a man's life must be made meaningless compared to the life of the Clan.
I believe the heart of the tree knows which way it needs to grow.
Listen to mine, I'm not lying.
Because my heart is telling me too.
Because I can't watch you become something you are not.
I believe the heart of a tree knows which way it needs to grow.
Take care.   You should take care.
Work so late. Not good for you.
Boy you're like a dog with a bone on that computer aren't you?
Agent Zabranski. Internal affairs. Need to ask you a couple of questions. You are Mika Coretti, yeah?
You have something of a social relationship.
You had lunch with him on the 13th and again on the 18th.
Are you working on something with him right now?
Has Agent Maslow seemed different lately, in any way? Has he done or said anything that struck you as unusual?
Just routine. The agency cares about its field operatives. We monitor for signs of stress, fatigue, mental exhaustion. Agent Maslow has a serious case load.

This agency is subject to the International laws and agreements that govern the jurisdiction of our authority. If a case is marked DNP we must respect the jurisprudence of the regional government and act accordingly.
Let me be clear, Agent Maslow. In the eyes of the law these materials do not exist. If so, than there is no case and if there is no case there is no reason for this conversation to continue.
This is the end for you, brother.
No death tasted as sweet as hers.
I watched you die when I pierced her heart. You have always been too weak to be Ozunu.
Why? So you can shake it for me?
Gonna take more than a knitting needle to fuck me up, boy.
Want me to come with you, boss?
Hands on your head! On your knees! Do it now!
We think he's able to lower the temperature of his body to remain neutral.
Sorry ma'am. Maslow okayed the water. That's it.
Good way to get yourself killed, Agent Coretti.
No ma'am. Those aren't our orders.
We got some guys in pajamas comin' to play spin the bottle.
They're not showing up on IR!
You should not mix these.    Very dangerous.
